property.name: Html
property.comment: Get the licensing and attribution Strings as HTML.

property.name: PlainText
property.comment: Get the licensing and attribution Strings as plain text.

property.name: LibraryName
property.comment: Get the name of the 3rd party library that this AttributionObject refers to.

method.name: Initialize
method.comment: Initialize the GeoPoint using Latitude and Longitude.

method.name: GetBearingTo
method.comment: Get the bearing (in degrees) from this GeoPoint to GeoPoint1.

method.name: Initialize2
method.comment: Initialize the GeoPoint using a Location object.

method.name: GetDistanceTo
method.comment: Get the distance (in metres) from this GeoPoint to GeoPoint1.

method.name: GetDestinationPoint
method.comment: Get a new GeoPoint that is the specified Distance (in meters) and Bearing (in degrees) away from this GeoPoint.

property.name: Altitude
property.comment: Get or Set the altitude (in meters) of the GeoPoint

property.name: Latitude
property.comment: Get or Set the Latitude of the GeoPoint.

property.name: Longitude
property.comment: Get or Set the Longitude of the GeoPoint.

method.name: Extend
method.comment: Extend the bounds of this BoundingBox with the bounds of BoundingBox1.

method.name: Initialize
method.comment: Initialise the BoundingBox with NorthWest and SouthEast Latitude and Longitude.

method.name: GetNorthWest
method.comment: Get the top left point of this BoundingBox as a GeoPoint.

method.name: GetSouthEast
method.comment: Get the bottom right point of this BoundingBox as a GeoPoint.

method.name: Contains
method.comment: Returns True if this BoundingBox contains the Latitude, Longitude.

method.name: Contains2
method.comment: Returns True if this BoundingBox contains GeoPoint1.

method.name: Initialize2
method.comment: Initialise the BoundingBox with NorthWest and SouthEast GeoPoints.

property.name: LongitudeEast
property.comment: Get the easterly longitude of this BoundingBox.

property.name: LatitudeSouth
property.comment: Get the southerly latitude of this BoundingBox.

property.name: LongitudeWest
property.comment: Get the westerly longitude of this BoundingBox.

property.name: LatitudeNorth
property.comment: Get the northerly latitude of this BoundingBox.

method.name: Initialize
method.comment: Initialize the Marker using Latitude and Longitude. Pass Null as Icon value if you want to use the default Icon.

method.name: Initialize6
method.comment: Initialize the Marker using a GeoPoint object and UniqueId. Pass Null as Icon value if you want to use the default Icon.

method.name: Initialize4
method.comment: Initialize the Marker using Latitude, Longitude and UniqueId. Pass Null as Icon value if you want to use the default Icon.

method.name: IsEqualTo
method.comment: Returns True if this Marker is the same object as aMarker.

method.name: Initialize5
method.comment: Initialize the Marker using a Location object and UniqueId. Pass Null as Icon value if you want to use the default Icon.

method.name: Initialize2
method.comment: Initialize the Marker using a Location object. Pass Null as Icon value if you want to use the default Icon.

method.name: Initialize3
method.comment: Initialize the Marker using a GeoPoint object. Pass Null as Icon value if you want to use the default Icon.

property.name: Description
property.comment: Get the Marker description.

property.name: GeoPoint
property.comment: Get the Marker location.

property.name: MarkerHotspot
property.comment: Set the hotspot for a Marker. This is where the origin (0,0) of a point will be located relative to the Marker. In other words this acts as an offset. NONE indicates that no adjustment should be made.

property.name: UniqueId
property.comment: Get the Marker UniqueId.

property.name: Title
property.comment: Get the Marker title.

class.name: uk.co.martinpearman.b4a.osmdroid.views.overlays.wrappers.MyMyLocationOverlayWrapper
class.event: LocationChanged(NewLocation As Location, IsFirstFix As Boolean)
ProviderChanged(Provider As String, Enabled As Boolean)

method.name: Initialize
method.comment: Initialize the MyLocationOverlay.

method.name: SetCompassCenter
method.comment: Set the point at which the compass should be drawn within the MapView. Default value is (35, 35).

property.name: LocationUpdateMinDistance
property.comment: Get or Set the minimum distance (in meters) change that should be considered a new GPS fix. Default value is 0.

property.name: LocationUpdateMinTime
property.comment: Get or Set the minimum time (in milliseconds) between GPS fixes that should treat the last fix as a new fix. Default value is 0.

property.name: FollowLocationEnabled
property.comment: Get or Set whether FollowLocation is enabled. If FollowLocation is enabled then the map will automatically center itself on the last GPS fix. Default value is False.

property.name: CompassEnabled
property.comment: Get or Set whether the compass is enabled. Default value is False.

property.name: LastFix
property.comment: Get the last GPS fix as a Location object.

property.name: DrawAccuracyEnabled
property.comment: Get or Set whether the DrawAccuracy circle is drawn around the Person icon. Default value is True.

property.name: PersonIcon
property.comment: Sets the icon used for the MyLocationOverlay. The default icon is a 'pegman' type person icon.

property.name: MyLocationEnabled
property.comment: Get or Set whether the MyLocationOverlay should listen for GPS fixes. Default value is False.

class.name: uk.co.martinpearman.b4a.osmdroid.views.overlays.wrappers.DeprecatedItemizedIconOverlayWrapper
class.event: Click(Title As String, Description As String, Point As GeoPoint) As Boolean
LongClick(Title As String, Description As String, Point As GeoPoint) As Boolean

method.name: Initialize
method.comment: Initialize the MarkersOverlay.

method.name: GetBoundingBox
method.comment: Get a BoundingBox which represents the area that is covered by the Markers.

method.name: AddMarkers
method.comment: Add a List of Markers to the MarkersOverlay.

method.name: RemoveMarkers
method.comment: Remove all Markers from the MarkersOverlay.

method.name: RemoveMarker
method.comment: Remove a Marker from the MarkersOverlay.

method.name: SetTileSource
method.comment: Set the TileSource that the minimap should display.

method.name: Initialize
method.comment: Initialize the MinimapOverlay.

property.name: ZoomDifference
property.comment: Get or Set the difference in zoom levels between the minimap and the main MapView map. Default value varies based upon the TileSource being used by the main MapView map.

property.name: Height
property.comment: Get or Set the height of the minimap in pixels. Default height is 100 pixels.

property.name: Width
property.comment: Get or Set the width of the minimap in pixels. Default width is 100 pixels.

property.name: Padding
property.comment: Get or Set the padding (in pixels) between the minimap and the bottom right hand corner of the MapView. Default padding is 10 pixels.

method.name: Initialize
method.comment: Initialize the TilesOverlay, the TileSource must implement the Slippy map tile naming convention.

method.name: Initialize4
method.comment: Initialize the TilesOverlay, the TileSource must implement the TileMapService (TMS) map tile naming convention. An Array of Strings is passed for the BaseUrls parameter.

method.name: Initialize2
method.comment: Initialize the TilesOverlay, the TileSource must implement the Slippy map tile naming convention. An Array of Strings is passed for the BaseUrls parameter.

method.name: Initialize3
method.comment: Initialize the TilesOverlay, the TileSource must implement the TileMapService (TMS) map tile naming convention.

property.name: DataConnectionEnabled
property.comment: Get or Set whether this TilesOverlay will use the device's data connection.

property.name: LoadingLineColor
property.comment: Get or Set the line color used to separate the background color drawn while waiting a tile to be downloaded. The line color will only be drawn if the background color is NOT set to transparent. The default value is Colors.rgb(200, 192, 192).

property.name: LoadingBackgroundColor
property.comment: Get or Set the background color displayed while waiting for a tile to be downloaded. Setting a value of Colors.TRANSPARENT will disable the display of any background color. The default value is Colors.TRANSPARENT, no background color is displayed.

method.name: Initialize
method.comment: Initialize the Marker using Latitude and Longitude. Pass Null as Icon value if you want to use the default Icon.

method.name: Initialize6
method.comment: Initialize the Marker using a GeoPoint object and UniqueId. Pass Null as Icon value if you want to use the default Icon.

method.name: Initialize4
method.comment: Initialize the Marker using Latitude, Longitude and UniqueId. Pass Null as Icon value if you want to use the default Icon.

method.name: IsEqualTo
method.comment: Returns True if this Marker is the same object as aMarker.

method.name: Initialize5
method.comment: Initialize the Marker using a Location object and UniqueId. Pass Null as Icon value if you want to use the default Icon.

method.name: Initialize2
method.comment: Initialize the Marker using a Location object. Pass Null as Icon value if you want to use the default Icon.

method.name: Initialize3
method.comment: Initialize the Marker using a GeoPoint object. Pass Null as Icon value if you want to use the default Icon.

property.name: Description
property.comment: Get the Marker description.

property.name: GeoPoint
property.comment: Get the Marker location.

property.name: MarkerHotspot
property.comment: Set the hotspot for a Marker. This is where the origin (0,0) of a point will be located relative to the Marker. In other words this acts as an offset. NONE indicates that no adjustment should be made.

property.name: UniqueId
property.comment: Get the Marker UniqueId.

property.name: Title
property.comment: Get the Marker title.

method.name: Initialize
method.comment: Initialize the MarkersEventsOverlay.

method.name: GetBoundingBox
method.comment: Get a BoundingBox which represents the area that is covered by the Markers.

method.name: AddMarkers
method.comment: Add a List of Markers to the MarkersEventsOverlay.

method.name: RemoveMarkers
method.comment: Remove all Markers from the MarkersEventsOverlay.

method.name: RemoveMarker
method.comment: Remove a Marker from the MarkersEventsOverlay.

method.name: Initialize
method.comment: Initialize the MarkersFocusOverlay.

method.name: SetInfoWindowDescriptionSize
method.comment: Set the size of the InfoWindow title text.

method.name: GetBoundingBox
method.comment: Get a BoundingBox which represents the area that is covered by the Markers.

method.name: AddMarkers
method.comment: Add a List of Markers to the MarkersFocusOverlay.

method.name: SetInfoWindowBackgroundColor
method.comment: Set the background color of the InfoWindow.

method.name: SetInfoWindowDescriptionColor
method.comment: Set the color of the InfoWindow description text.

method.name: SetInfoWindowTitleSize
method.comment: Set the size of the InfoWindow title text.

method.name: RemoveMarker
method.comment: Remove a Marker from the MarkersFocusOverlay.

method.name: SetInfoWindowTitleColor
method.comment: Set the color of the InfoWindow title text.

method.name: SetInfoWindowMaxWidth
method.comment: Set the maximum width (in pixels) of the InfoWindow. 200 pixels is the default width.

method.name: RemoveMarkers
method.comment: Remove all Markers from the MarkersOverlay.

method.name: Initialize
method.comment: Initialise the ScaleBarOverlay.

method.name: SetMinZoom
method.comment: Set the minimum zoom level at which to display the scale bar. Default minimum zoom level is 0.

method.name: SetScaleUnit
method.comment:
Set the unit of measure to be used by the scale bar. Possible values are: ScaleBarOverlay.SCALE_UNIT_IMPERIAL ScaleBarOverlay.SCALE_UNIT_METRIC ScaleBarOverlay.SCALE_UNIT_NAUTICAL
Default value is ScaleBarOverlay.SCALE_UNIT_METRIC

method.name: SetEnabled
method.comment: Set whether the scale bar should be drawn on the map.

method.name: SetTextColor
method.comment: Set the color of the scale bar label text.

method.name: SetLineWidth
method.comment: Set the width of the line used to draw the scale bar. Default line width is 2 pixels.

method.name: SetOffset
method.comment: Set the offset at which to display the scale bar on the map. Default offset is (10, 10)

method.name: SetPosition
method.comment:
Set the position to display the scale bar within the MapView. Possible values are: ScaleBarOverlay.BOTTOM_LEFT ScaleBarOverlay.TOP_LEFT
Default value is ScaleBarOverlay.TOP_LEFT

method.name: SetLineColor
method.comment: Set the color of the line used to draw the scale bar.

method.name: SetTextSize
method.comment: Set the font size of the scale bar label text. Default font size is 12 pixels.

method.name: Initialize
method.comment: Initialize the MarkersBalloonOverlay.

method.name: UnsetFocusedMarker
method.comment: Clears the focused Marker, effectively closing the Balloon.

method.name: GetBoundingBox
method.comment: Get a BoundingBox which represents the area that is covered by the Markers.

method.name: AddMarkers
method.comment: Add a List of Markers to the MarkersBalloonOverlay.

method.name: RemoveMarkers
method.comment: Remove all Markers from the MarkersBalloonOverlay.

method.name: RemoveMarker
method.comment: Remove a Marker from the MarkersBalloonOverlay.

property.name: FocusedMarker
property.comment: Get or Set the Marker whose Balloon is displayed. Returns Null if no Balloon is displayed.

method.name: Initialize
method.comment: Initialize the PathOverlay and set the PathColor

method.name: GetAllPoints
method.comment: Get a List of all GeoPoints in the path.

method.name: ClearPath
method.comment: Clear all points from the path.

method.name: GetBoundingBox
method.comment: Get a BoundingBox which represents the area that is covered by the path.

method.name: AddPoint2
method.comment: Add a Point to the path using a Location object.

method.name: AddPoints
method.comment: Add a List of GeoPoints to the path.

method.name: AddGreatCircle
method.comment: Add NumberOfPoints points to the path to create a great circle path from StartPoint to EndPoint.

method.name: AddPoint3
method.comment: Add a Point to the path using a GeoPoint object

method.name: GetNumberOfPoints
method.comment: Get the total number of points added to the path.

method.name: AddPoint
method.comment: Add a Point to the path using Latitude and Longitude.

property.name: StrokeWidth
property.comment: Get or Set the stroke width used to draw the path. Default stroke width is 2 pixels.

property.name: Alpha
property.comment: Get or Set the Alpha transparency of the path. Values of 0 to 255 are valid. Default value is 255 fully opaque.

property.name: PathStyle
property.comment:
Set the path style used to draw the path. Valid values are: PathOverlay.FILL PathOverlay.FILL_AND_STROKE PathOverlay.STROKE
Default value is PathOverlay.STROKE

property.name: Color
property.comment: Get or Set the color of the path.

field.name: FILL
field.comment: Geometry and text drawn with this style will be filled, ignoring all stroke-related settings in the paint.

field.name: STROKE
field.comment: Geometry and text drawn with this style will be stroked, respecting the stroke-related fields on the paint.

field.name: FILL_AND_STROKE
field.comment: Geometry and text drawn with this style will be both filled and stroked at the same time, respecting the stroke-related fields on the paint.

method.name: SetMyLocation3
method.comment: Set the location of the overlay using a GeoPoint object.

method.name: Initialize
method.comment: Initialize the SimpleLocationOverlay.

method.name: SetMyLocation
method.comment: Set the location of the overlay using Latitude and Longitude.

method.name: GetMyLocation
method.comment: Get the location of the overlay.

method.name: SetMyLocation2
method.comment: Set the location of the overlay using a Location object.

method.name: AnimateTo2
method.comment: Animate the map towards the given Location.

method.name: AnimateTo3
method.comment: Animate the map towards the given GeoPoint.

method.name: GetTileSources
method.comment: Return a List of the names of available TileSources.

method.name: RemoveOverlays
method.comment: Remove all Overlays layers from the map.

method.name: Initialize
method.comment: Initialize the MapView.

method.name: SetTileSource
method.comment: Set the TileSource that the map should display.

method.name: CanZoomIn
method.comment: Return whether or not the map can be zoomed in one more level.

method.name: SetCenter3
method.comment: Set the map center using a GeoPoint.

method.name: SetCenter2
method.comment: Set the map center using a Location.

method.name: Invalidate
method.comment: Force the MapView to redraw itself. This must be called after making changes to Overlay layers for example.

method.name: ZoomIn
method.comment: Zoom the map in by one zoom level.

method.name: GetMaxZoomLevel
method.comment: Return the maximum zoom level for the point currently at the map center.

method.name: SetMultiTouchEnabled
method.comment: Set whether or not the MapView multi-touch controller is enabled.

method.name: SetZoomEnabled
method.comment: Set whether or not the MapView zoom control is enabled.

method.name: SetCenter
method.comment: Set the map center.

method.name: CanZoomOut
method.comment: Return whether or not the map can be zoomed out one more level.

method.name: RemoveOverlay
method.comment: Remove an Overlay layer from the map.

method.name: GetMinZoomLevel
method.comment: Return the minimum zoom level for the point currently at the map center.

method.name: FitMapToBoundingBox
method.comment: Fit the map to the BoundingBox.

method.name: AddXYTileSource
method.comment: Add an XYTileSource to the map.

method.name: SetDataConnectionEnabled
method.comment: Set whether or not the MapView can use the device's data connection. Useful if you are using offline tiles or the map tiles already exist in the cache.

method.name: AnimateTo
method.comment: Animate the map towards the given point.

method.name: ZoomOut
method.comment: Zoom the map out by one zoom level.

method.name: AddTileSource
method.comment: Add a generic ITileSource to the map.

method.name: GetAttributionObjects
method.comment: Returns an Array of AttributionObjects. An AttributionObject contains licensing and attribution Strings relating to 3rd party libraries used in this B4A library. You are required to display some or all of these Strings in your application if you use the related B4A library object(s).

method.name: GetCenter
method.comment: Return the map center as a GeoPoint.

method.name: AddOverlay
method.comment: Add an Overlay layer to the map.

method.name: GetTileSource
method.comment: Return the name of the currently selected TileSource.

method.name: SetHttpRequestUserAgent
method.comment: Sets the value of the UserAgent header when requesting tiles using HTTP. Default value is your application's packagename. Recommended value is a unique value that identifies your application.

property.name: Zoom
property.comment: Get or Set the map zoom level.

property.name: CloudmadeTileSourceStyle
property.comment: Get or Set the Cloudmade TileSource Style

property.name: MapOrientation
property.comment: Get or Set the MapView orientation in degrees. This is an alpha feature, results may be unpredictable!

method.name: Initialize
method.comment: Initialize the XYTileSource object. The XYTileSource must implement the Slippy map tile naming convention.

method.name: Initialize2
method.comment: Initialize the XYTileSource object. The XYTileSource must implement the Slippy map tile naming convention. An Array of Strings is passed for the BaseUrls parameter.

property.name: TMSMode
property.comment: Get or Set whether Tile Map Service (TMS) mode is enabled or not. By default TMS mode is NOT enabled.
